title: What has The Chase's Mark Labbett said about his weight loss?
text:
The Chase star Mark Labbett before and after his apparent weight loss (Pictures: Rex/Cleveland Bay)

Mark Labbett, aka The Beast as he’s known on The Chase, was looking noticeably slimmer after he took part in a pub quiz.

The quiz was held at The Cleveland Bay in Stockton-On-Tees, and photographs from the night seem to show that he’s lost weight after having reunited with his wife, Katie.

Here’s what Mark himself has said in the past on the subject of his weight change…

What has Mark Labbett said about his weight loss?

The Chaser previously admitted on Loose Women that health concerns, including diabetes, had been a driving force behind his recent weight loss.

Mark, 54, said: ‘In some sense it made it easier, just no arguments now.

‘I’ve enjoyed being this heavy. I always used to say I’ve got away with it. Well, now I haven’t so the weight’s coming off.’

Mark at The TV Choice Awards in September 2019 (Photo by Eamonn M. McCormack/Getty Images)

According to TeesideLive, Mark spent the evening helping different teams, with The Cleveland Bay’s Peter Rafferty saying: ‘He came up for the night, took part in our quiz night and sat at a different table for each round helping a different team.’

This comes after Mark, 53, and his wife Katie, 26, reunited following their short separation, with Mark having said on Loose Women in September: ‘Like a lot of relationships you go through a rough patch and our priority is our son and we’re working our way through.’

Mark and his wife Katie (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images)

He added: ‘We try to be quite private, we’ve never done the glossy magazines. A tabloid offered us money for an exclusive and we politely declined. It’s not what we do.

‘You won’t find a pic of our son, nor am I gonna name him. If he wants to have social media when he’s older he can but I won’t do it for him. I want to embarrass him when he’s old enough to embarrass me back.’

The Chase airs weeknights at 5pm on ITV.
